hadiths.text: Jabir said:"The Prophet came to 'Abdullah bin Ubayy after he had been placed in his grave, and commanded that he be brought out. He placed him on his knees and blew on him and clothed him in his shirt. And Allah knows best

chapter.ara-name: باب إِخْرَاجِ الْمَيِّتِ مِنَ اللَّحْدِ بَعْدَ أَنْ يُوضَعَ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Bringing The Deceased Out Of The Lahd After He Has Been Placed Therein
